snippet: The snack company’s revenue, which rose 2 percent, was helped by sales of Pop-Tarts and strength in North America.
lead_paragraph: The snack company’s revenue, which rose 2 percent, was helped by sales of Pop-Tarts and strength in North America.

headline.seo: Kellogg Income Slips 12 Percent, but Beats Estimates
headline.main: At Kellogg, Income Slips Despite Rise in Revenue
headline.print_headline: At Kellogg, Income Slips Despite Rise In Revenue
